variants.Description in input context: E46K mutation increased the propensity of α-synuclein to fibrillize, but this effect was less than that of the A53T mutation.
Substitution of Glu46 for an Ala also increased the assembly of α-synuclein, but the polymers formed can have different ultrastructures.
Mutation of Glu83 to a Lys or Ala increased polymerization but perturbed some of the properties of mature amyloid.
